3 void YawtoQuat(double yaw, geometry_msgs::Pose& pose)
4 {
5  tf::Quaternion quat = tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(yaw);
6  pose.orientation.w = quat.getW();
7  pose.orientation.x = quat.getX();
8  pose.orientation.y = quat.getY();
9  pose.orientation.z = quat.getZ();
10 }
11 
12 geometry_msgs::Point getpointaroundR1(geometry_msgs::Point r0, geometry_msgs::Point r1)
13 {
14  //(x-r1.x)^2 + (y-r1.y)^2 = 0.7^2;
15  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point> radial;
16  geometry_msgs::Point p;
17  for(int i=0;i<16;i++)
18  {
19  p.x = r1.x + 1*cos(2*M_PI-(M_PI/180)*(i*22.5));
20  p.y = r1.y + 1*sin(M_PI-(M_PI/180)*(i*22.5));
21  radial.push_back(p);
22  }
23  double temp = 1000;
24  double dist = 0;
25  int id = 0;
26  for(int i=0;i<radial.size();i++)
27  {
28  double x = r0.x-radial[i].x;
29  double y = r0.y-radial[i].y;
30  dist = pow((pow((x),2) + pow((y),2)),0.5);
31  if(dist<temp)
32  {
33  id = i;
34  temp = dist;
35  }
36  }
37 
38  return radial[id];
39 }
40 
41 geometry_msgs::Point getpointbehindR1(geometry_msgs::Pose r1)
42 {
43 
44  double yaw = 0;
45  geometry_msgs::Point point_behind;
46  geometry_msgs::Pose pose_behind;
47  geometry_msgs::Quaternion q = r1.orientation;
48 
49  yaw = atan2(2.0*(q.w*q.z + q.y*q.x), q.w*q.w - q.x*q.x - q.y*q.y - q.z*q.z);
50  if(yaw<0){yaw += 2*M_PI;}
51 
52  point_behind.x = (-0.7)*cos(yaw) - (0)*sin(yaw) + r1.position.x;
53  point_behind.y = (-0.7)*sin(yaw) + (0)*cos(yaw) + r1.position.y;
54 
55 
56  //pose_behind.orientation = data.pose1.orientation;
57  return point_behind;
58 
59 }

61 geometry_msgs::Point localtoglobal(geometry_msgs::Pose current, geometry_msgs::Point point)
62 {
63  geometry_msgs::Point cvtpt;
64  double x0 = current.position.x;
65  double y0 = current.position.y;
66  double yaw = tf::getYaw(current.orientation);
67  if(yaw<0){yaw = yaw + 2*M_PI;}
68  cvtpt.x = point.x*cos(yaw) - point.y*sin(yaw) + x0;
69  cvtpt.y = point.x*sin(yaw) + point.y*cos(yaw) + y0;
70  return cvtpt;
71 }

74 void checkCorners(geometry_msgs::Pose current, geometry_msgs::Pose goal, geometry_msgs::Point corner1, geometry_msgs::Point corner2, GridProcessing& grid,bool& reachable1,bool& reachable2)
75 {
76  geometry_msgs::Point corner1c;
77  geometry_msgs::Point corner2c;
78  geometry_msgs::Point corner1g;
79  geometry_msgs::Point corner2g;
80  double orient = atan2((goal.position.y-current.position.y),(goal.position.x-current.position.x)); //orientation if r0 is facing goal from current pos
81  if(orient<0){orient = orient + 2*M_PI;}
82  if(orient==0 && current.position.x>goal.position.x){orient = M_PI;} //if goal is on the left, we want orient of 180 not 0, atan2 does not differientiate here so we must include this if
83  geometry_msgs::Pose temp = current;
84  YawtoQuat(orient,temp);
85  corner1c = localtoglobal(temp,corner1); //global loc of corner at current pos facing goal
86  corner2c = localtoglobal(temp,corner2);
87  temp.position = goal.position;
88  corner1g = localtoglobal(temp,corner1); //global loc of corner at goal pos
89  corner2g = localtoglobal(temp,corner2);
90  Cornerpacket corners = {corner1,corner2,corner1c,corner2c,corner1g,corner2g};
91 
92  geometry_msgs::Point goal_local;
93  geometry_msgs::Point zero;
94  zero.x = 0; //centre of robot
95  zero.y = 0;
96  //bool reachable = gridProcessing.checkConnectivity(zero,goal_local);
97 
98  zero.x = corner1c.x - current.position.x; //corner1 of robot at current pos in ogmap
99  zero.y = corner1c.y - current.position.y;
100  goal_local.x = corner1g.x - current.position.x; //corner1 of robot at goal pos in ogmap
101  goal_local.y = corner1g.y - current.position.y;
102  reachable1 = grid.checkConnectivity(zero,goal_local); //check if corner1 can go from current pos to goal pos without passing through occupied cells
103 
104  zero.x = corner2c.x - current.position.x; //corner2 of robot
105  zero.y = corner2c.y - current.position.y;
106  goal_local.x = corner2g.x - current.position.x; //corner2 of robot at goal pos in ogmap
107  goal_local.y = corner2g.y - current.position.y;
108  reachable2 = grid.checkConnectivity(zero,goal_local);
109 }

111 bool Corridortype(geometry_msgs::Point zero, geometry_msgs::Point temp_goal,int check_type,GridProcessing& grid)
112 {
113  //zero //interm_points
114  //temp_goal// r1pose - doesnt change
115 
116  double count = 0;
117  double t = 0;
118 
119  switch (check_type)
120  {
121  case 1:
122  zero.y = zero.y - 0.5;
123  for(int i=0;i<20;i++)
124  {
125  zero.y = zero.y + 0.05*i;
126  if(!grid.checkConnectivity(zero,temp_goal))
127  {
128  count = count + 1;
129  t = t + 1;
130  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Trues: "<<t);
131  }
132  else
133  {
134  count = count + 1;
135  }
136  }
137  break;
138  case 2:
139  zero.x = zero.x - 0.5;
140  for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
141  {
142  zero.x = zero.x + 0.1*i;
143  if(!grid.checkConnectivity(zero,temp_goal))
144  {
145  count = count + 1;
146  t = t + 1;
147  }
148  else
149  {
150  count = count + 1;
151  }
152  }
153  break;
154  default:
155  break;
156  }
157  double per;
158  per = t/count;
159  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Per: "<<per<<" Count: "<<count);
160  if(per>0.55)
161  {
162  return false;
163  }
164  else
165  {
166  return true;
167  }
168 }
